name: • A silver ball only reflects what the soul does not see... •
description: Writing for you has been one of the best things that has happened to me in the last year, but how much more can I do in the rest of it? only the results will speak, the real reflection of things, without hopes or expectations, only facts.  My work flow has been varying too much as time goes by, but my experience has not stopped increasing, I am a faithful believer that you can never be worse than the day before, every day is an improvement, a learning or an experience.  But what is of being if you don't have a critical thinking? you always need to see everything from better angles, without prejudices or weird things, only reason speaks, and that's why I decided to create this, a ball corrupted by itself, the reflection is altered, life is clouded and the ball is broken.
